name: My Sugar
lyrics:
作词 : Kellan Barrett/Nicco Sanchez (SauceUp)
作曲 : Kellan Barrett/Nicco Sanchez (SauceUp)
出品人 : 李辉
监制 : 李辉
编曲 : Kellan Barrett/Nicco Sanchez (SauceUp)
制作人 : 鹿晗/PAN DENG
监唱/录音 : Kellan Barrett/Nicco Sanchez/郑俊树J.SHU(SauceUp)
人声编辑/混音/母带 : 赵靖BIG.J(SBMS)
A&R : PAN DENG
鹿晗工作室 : 高苏尧/乐叔/胡思怡/杨伊/邢秀丽
制作统筹 : 香香/王碧莹
企划 : 陆瘦/陈葎/沈睿迪/苗梓轩/李海蛟
宣传 : 陆瘦/林玥/沈睿迪/黎婧
版权运营 : 王琳/梁丽/王雪/曹萌
出品 : 上海风华秋实文化传媒有限公司
（未经著作权人许可不得翻唱翻录或使用）

You’re out in space
I’m underground deep
You’re so outta my league
Heat the atmosphere
When you’re in town babe
It’s like a thousand degrees

Something in your eyes
I can’t look away
And I’ve never been so outta my mind
But I feel lucky today

Can you be my sugar
Make it alright
Taste like summer
In the moonlight
Get this feeling
We should rewrite
Every reason not to try
I would die
For your sugar on mine

Under covers late I can barely
Breathe through your lip balm
Our engines starting to go
When you say my name when you say my
It’s like a time bomb
And it’s about to explode

Something in your eyes
I can’t look away
And I’ve never been so outta my mind
But I feel lucky today

Can you be my sugar
Make it alright
Taste like summer
In the moonlight
Get this feeling
We should rewrite
Every reason not to try
I would die
For your sugar on mine

Sugar sugar,ahh when you put your lips on mine
Sugar sugar,uh huh
Sugar sugar,ahh when you put your lips on mine
Sugar sugar,uh huh

Something in your eyes
I can’t look away
And I’ve never been so outta my mind
But I feel lucky today

Can you be my sugar
Make it alright
Taste like summer
In the moonlight
Get this feeling
We should rewrite
Every reason not to try
I would die
For your sugar on mine

收起
